name: lib/chaldeas.js
dispatch
description: Chrome Launch with Headlessmode and Connect devtools protocol

name: lib/chrome/chrome.js
mergeDefaultChromeOption
description: Convert to object corresponding to chrome launcher option.

name: connectDevToolsProtocolClient
description: try connect at chrome devtools protocol

name: lib/chrome/devtools.js
lib/chrome/launcher.js
defaultLaunchOption
description: chrome headless mode launch default options

name: mergeLaunchOption
description: Convert to object corresponding to chrome launcher option.

name: lib/chrome/types/chrome.js
lib/chrome/types/launcher.js
lib/index.js
./README.md

content:
{
  "name": "chaldeas",
  "version": "0.1.2",
  "main": "src/index.js",
  "private": false,
  "repository": "ssh://git@github.com/teitei-tk/Chaldeas.git",
  "homepage": "https://github.com/teitei-tk/Chaldeas",
  "keywords": [
    "chrome",
    "headless",
    "headless-browser",
    "chrome-headless",
    "devtools"
  ],
  "bugs": {
    "url": "https://github.com/teitei-tk/Chaldeas/issues",
    "email": "teitei.tk@gmail.com"
  },
  "author": "teitei-tk <teitei.tk@gmail.com>",
  "license": "APSL-2.0",
  "scripts": {
    "eslint:lint": "eslint lib/",
    "flow:lint": "flow lib/",
    "lint": "yarn run eslint:lint; yarn run flow:lint;",
    "build": "babel lib -d src",
    "chrome:launch": "yarn build; docker run -it -d --rm --name chaldeas --shm-size=1024m --cap-add=SYS_ADMIN -v `pwd`:/data teitei/chaldeas;",
    "doc:gen": "esdoc -c .esdoc.json",
    "flow:gen": "flow-copy-source lib src",
    "pre:publish": "yarn run lint; yarn run build; yarn run flow:gen; yarn run doc:gen"
  },
  "engines": {
    "node": "6.9.1"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "babel-runtime": "^6.23.0",
    "chrome-remote-interface": "^0.22.0",
    "chrome-remote-interface-flowtype": "^0.1.3",
    "lighthouse": "^1.6.5"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "babel-cli": "^6.24.1",
    "babel-core": "^6.24.1",
    "babel-eslint": "^7.2.3",
    "babel-plugin-transform-async-to-generator": "^6.24.1",
    "babel-plugin-transform-class-properties": "^6.24.1",
    "babel-plugin-transform-flow-strip-types": "^6.22.0",
    "babel-plugin-transform-runtime": "^6.23.0",
    "babel-preset-es2015": "^6.24.1",
    "babel-preset-es2017": "^6.24.1",
    "babel-preset-flow": "^6.23.0",
    "babili": "^0.1.2",
    "esdoc": "alpha",
    "esdoc-flow-type-plugin": "^0.0.1",
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "^0.0.7",
    "eslint": "^3.19.0",
    "eslint-config-airbnb-base": "^11.2.0",
    "eslint-plugin-async-await": "^0.0.0",
    "eslint-plugin-flowtype": "^2.33.0",
    "eslint-plugin-import": "^2.2.0",
    "flow-bin": "^0.46.0",
    "flow-copy-source": "^1.2.0"
  }
}
name: package.json
